mapper.insert: insert into grapeems_dept(deptName, deptBuildTime, deptPersonNumber, isDeleted) values (#{deptName}, #{deptBuildTime}, #{deptPersonNumber}, 1)
mapper.update: update grapeems_dept set isDeleted = 0 where deptId = #{id}
mapper.select: select deptName from grapeems_dept where isDeleted = 1
select deptName from grapeems_dept where isDeleted = 1 and deptId = #{deptId}
select deptId from grapeems_dept where isDeleted = 1 and deptName = #{deptName}
